'''Cabbages''' are a [[Cooking Ingredient]] item used in recipes to create [[Food]] items.

==How to Obtain==
Cabbages can be dropped by destructible crates, barrels and pots or by [[Investigation]] points found all over [[Teyvat]].

Additionally, the [[Unusual Hilichurl]] drops 1 to 3 Cabbages upon defeat.
